attributes.action: Make companies realise, not everyone has the internet to apply for a job & to start giving the option to have an application for or send a CV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have applied for a large number of vacancies within the past couple of months and at least 85% of them has wrote to me, telling me that they cannot accept applications made with a CV or Letter and I must apply online. Not everyone can afford a computer and/or the internet,(especially those out of work) or have limited access like myself.
